name: Classic Oxford Button-Down Shirt
description: A timeless wardrobe staple. This Oxford shirt is crafted from breathable, high-quality cotton, offering a perfect blend of comfort and style. Ideal for both professional settings and smart-casual weekends.

faqs.question: Does it wrinkle easily?
faqs.answer: The Oxford weave is naturally more resistant to wrinkles than other cotton fabrics.

faqs.question: Is it a slim fit?
faqs.answer: It is a regular fit, designed for comfort and a classic silhouette.

faqs.question: Will this shirt shrink?
faqs.answer: We recommend machine washing cold to minimize shrinking.

faqs.question: Is the fabric thick or thin?
faqs.answer: It is a mid-weight fabric that is both breathable and durable.

name: Straight-Fit Chino Pants
description: Versatile and comfortable, these chino pants are a modern alternative to jeans. Made with a hint of stretch for all-day comfort, they are a staple for any casual or semi-formal look.

faqs.question: How should I style these?
faqs.answer: These can be dressed up with a button-down shirt or dressed down with a simple t-shirt and sneakers.

faqs.question: Are they stretchy?
faqs.answer: Yes, they contain a small percentage of spandex for added flexibility.

name: Slim-Fit Black Jeans
description: A modern take on a classic. These slim-fit jeans are made with a slight stretch for comfort and a sleek silhouette. The deep black wash maintains its color, making them a versatile piece for any occasion.

name: Minimalist Bifold Leather Wallet
description: Crafted from full-grain leather, this bifold wallet offers a sleek, minimalist design without sacrificing functionality. It's the perfect size for your pockets while holding all your essentials.

faqs.question: How long will the leather last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, full-grain leather develops a rich patina and can last for decades.

faqs.question: Is it bulky?
faqs.answer: No, the design is specifically minimalist to reduce bulk.

faqs.question: Does it come with a gift box?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our belts are shipped in a premium gift box.

faqs.question: How do I choose the right size?
faqs.answer: We recommend choosing a size one or two inches larger than your waist size.

name: Premium Leather Dress Shoes
description: Crafted from high-quality leather with a sleek, minimalist design, these dress shoes are a staple for any formal or business-casual attire. They are comfortable and built to last.

faqs.question: Are they true to size?
faqs.answer: Yes, our shoes are designed to fit true to size.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for a wide foot?
faqs.answer: We recommend checking the size chart and considering sizing up if you have a wide foot.

name: Classic White Leather Sneakers
description: Clean, crisp, and comfortable. These white leather sneakers are an indispensable part of any modern wardrobe. They pair perfectly with everything from jeans to suits.

specs.label: Care
specs.value: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

faqs.question: How do I keep them clean?
faqs.answer: We recommend using a leather cleaner or wiping them down with a damp cloth to remove any scuffs.

faqs.question: Are they good for walking?
faqs.answer: Yes, they feature a cushioned insole for all-day comfort.

name: Soft Wool Blend Crewneck Sweater
description: A cozy and sophisticated sweater for cooler weather. Made from a soft wool blend, it provides warmth without bulk, perfect for layering over a shirt or wearing on its own.

faqs.question: Is this jacket warm enough for winter?
faqs.answer: It's designed for mild to moderate cold. For extreme cold, it's best for layering.

name: Silk Formal Tie
description: Add a touch of sophistication to your formal wear. Our ties are made from 100% silk, with a subtle texture and a classic width for a timeless look.

faqs.question: How do I clean this tie?
faqs.answer: We recommend dry cleaning only to maintain the quality of the silk.

name: Classic Denim Jacket
description: A durable and versatile denim jacket that gets better with every wear. It's the perfect layering piece for any casual outfit.

name: Wool Blend Trench Coat
description: Stay warm and stylish with this classic trench coat. Made from a premium wool blend, it offers a sophisticated silhouette and is perfect for formal or business-casual wear.

faqs.question: Is it rainproof?
faqs.answer: It is water-resistant but not fully waterproof. We recommend a waterproofing spray for heavy rain.

faqs.question: Is the fabric lightweight?
faqs.answer: The ripstop cotton is durable but still lightweight and breathable.

name: Cool Graphic T-Shirt
description: Express your style with our unique graphic tees. Made from a soft, ringspun cotton, they feature a unique design on the chest and back.

name: Silk Pocket Square Set
description: Add the perfect finishing touch to your suit or blazer with this set of three silk pocket squares. Each square features a unique, subtle pattern.

faqs.question: How do I fold these?
faqs.answer: There are many ways to fold a pocket square. We have a guide on our blog to help you.

faqs.question: Is it heavy?
faqs.answer: It is designed to be lightweight, especially for its capacity, but the weight will depend on what you carry.

name: Suede Chelsea Boots
description: A sleek and stylish boot for a versatile look. These Chelsea boots are made from a soft suede with an elastic side panel for easy on and off.

name: Formal Dress Socks (3-Pack)
description: Step up your sock game with this 3-pack of classic dress socks. Made from a comfortable cotton blend, they are designed to be soft, breathable, and stay up all day.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for all seasons?
faqs.answer: Yes, the breathable cotton blend is comfortable in all weather.

faqs.question: Is it one size fits all?
faqs.answer: Yes, the stretchy nature of cashmere makes it a comfortable fit for most head sizes.

name: Classic Piqué Polo Shirt
description: A classic polo shirt made from a durable piqué knit. It is a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.

name: Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt
description: The ultimate in casual comfort. This hooded sweatshirt is made from a soft fleece blend, perfect for lounging or a casual outing. It features a drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket.

faqs.question: Is it true to size?
faqs.answer: It has a relaxed fit, so if you prefer a tighter fit, we recommend sizing down.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for cold weather?
faqs.answer: This bomber is best for cool weather. It can be layered with a sweater for added warmth in colder climates.

name: Full-Zip Hoodie
description: The perfect layering piece for every day. Made from a comfortable and soft fleece, this hoodie features a full-zip closure and two front pockets.

name: Merino Wool V-Neck Sweater
description: A sophisticated V-neck sweater made from fine Merino wool. It is lightweight, breathable, and an excellent choice for a refined look. Perfect for layering over a dress shirt.

faqs.question: Does it pill easily?
faqs.answer: Merino wool is naturally resistant to pilling, and with proper care, it will maintain its smooth finish.

name: Slim-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
description: A modern dress shirt for the man on the go. The slim fit provides a tailored look, while the wrinkle-resistant fabric keeps you looking sharp all day.

faqs.question: How do I care for it?
faqs.answer: Machine wash on a cold, gentle cycle and hang dry to maintain its wrinkle-resistant properties.

faqs.question: Will they stretch out?
faqs.answer: The elastane provides a comfortable stretch but is designed to retain its shape over time.

name: Canvas Casual Sneakers
description: A lightweight and comfortable canvas sneaker for everyday wear. The minimalist design makes them a versatile choice for any casual outfit.

faqs.question: Can I wash these?
faqs.answer: We recommend spot cleaning or hand washing with a mild detergent.

name: Knit Button-Up Cardigan
description: A lightweight and versatile cardigan. It's an excellent layering piece for a smart-casual look. Made from a soft cotton blend, it's perfect for all seasons.

faqs.question: Does this shirt require ironing?
faqs.answer: The pique fabric is naturally wrinkle-resistant. A quick steam or light iron will keep it looking crisp.

name: Light Wash Denim Jeans
description: Crafted from soft, light-wash denim, these jeans offer a relaxed feel and a vintage look. The straight fit provides a comfortable and versatile silhouette.

faqs.question: Can I cuff these jeans?
faqs.answer: Yes, the straight leg fit makes them perfect for cuffing to create a different look.

name: Comfort Crewneck Sweatshirt
description: A classic sweatshirt for ultimate comfort. Made from a soft fleece blend with a ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem. Perfect for a relaxed, casual look.

faqs.question: Is it machine washable?
faqs.answer: Yes, machine wash cold with like colors.

name: Classic Wool Overcoat
description: A sophisticated overcoat for the colder months. Made from a durable wool blend, it is a timeless piece that will elevate any outfit.

faqs.question: Is it a heavy material?
faqs.answer: It is a mid-weight corduroy, providing texture and warmth without being too heavy.

name: Striped Piqué Polo Shirt
description: A classic polo with a modern twist. The subtle stripe pattern adds visual interest, while the piqué fabric ensures breathability and comfort.

faqs.question: Can I machine wash this?
faqs.answer: Yes, machine wash cold with like colors to preserve the stripes.

name: Leather Document Portfolio
description: A professional and stylish way to carry your documents. Made from genuine leather, this portfolio features a simple, elegant design with a secure zip closure.

faqs.question: Does it have a pen loop?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features a small internal loop for a pen.

faqs.question: Is it see-through?
faqs.answer: No, the fabric is a high-quality, dense weave that is not transparent.

name: Slim-Fit Chino Shorts
description: Perfect for warm weather, these chino shorts have a modern slim fit that sits just above the knee. Made from a comfortable cotton blend with a slight stretch.

faqs.question: Will they get softer over time?
faqs.answer: Yes, like all classic denim, these will soften with wear and washing.

name: Performance Running Sneakers
description: Designed for comfort and performance, these sneakers provide a lightweight and cushioned ride. The breathable mesh upper and responsive sole make them ideal for daily runs or workouts.

faqs.question: Can I use this for running?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is designed for all types of athletic activity, including running.

name: Lightweight Denim Shirt
description: A versatile denim shirt that can be worn alone or layered as a light jacket. It's made from a soft, lightweight denim that's comfortable for year-round wear.

faqs.question: Is it waterproof?
faqs.answer: The leather is water-resistant, but we recommend using a leather conditioner to protect it from heavy rain.

name: Wool Knit Tie
description: A casual alternative to a traditional silk tie. The wool knit provides a rich texture and a laid-back look. Perfect for dressing up a casual shirt.

faqs.question: Is it a heavy jacket?
faqs.answer: It has a substantial weight but is not overly heavy. The leather will soften with wear.

name: Vertical Striped Shirt
description: A stylish shirt with a subtle vertical stripe pattern. Made from a lightweight cotton, it's perfect for a smart-casual or business-casual look.

faqs.question: Is it a good summer shirt?
faqs.answer: Yes, the knit cotton is breathable and lightweight, making it a great choice for warm weather.

name: Stretch Chino Shorts
description: Comfort and style for summer. These chino shorts feature a classic fit and a hint of stretch for easy movement.

faqs.question: Is it heavy when empty?
faqs.answer: The leather construction makes it slightly heavier than a canvas bag, but it's designed to be comfortable to carry.

name: Classic Wool Peacoat
description: A timeless peacoat for a sharp, refined look. Made from a durable wool blend, it offers excellent warmth and a classic double-breasted design.

faqs.question: Does it wrinkle easily?
faqs.answer: Linen is known to wrinkle, but this is part of its natural and relaxed look.

name: Casual Leather Belt
description: A rugged and casual leather belt for everyday wear. Made from full-grain leather, it's designed to be durable and develop a unique patina over time.

faqs.question: Are they easy to care for?
faqs.answer: Yes, they are wrinkle-resistant and can be dry cleaned for best results.

name: Suede Derby Shoes
description: A stylish and versatile shoe that can be dressed up or down. The soft suede and cushioned sole make them comfortable for all-day wear.

faqs.question: Is it itchy?
faqs.answer: The acrylic blend is designed to make the scarf soft and comfortable against the skin.

name: Classic Leather Gloves
description: Keep your hands warm and stylish with these classic leather gloves. They are lined with a soft material for comfort and feature touchscreen compatibility.

faqs.question: Can I wear this over a blazer?
faqs.answer: It is designed to be worn over a sweatshirt or sweater, but the lightweight design makes it a versatile layering piece.

name: Classic Wool Fedora Hat
description: A stylish and sophisticated hat for any occasion. Made from high-quality wool, it has a classic fedora shape with a simple band.
